title: For Sale/Trade:  HK VP9 in LNIB Condition
postcontent:
Voted best new handgun  for year 2014. Undoubtably the  BEST striker fired pistol that you can buy.
The VP9 uses HK’s ergonomic handgun grip design that includes three changeable back-straps and six side panels to accommodate all hand sizes. Molded finger grooves in the front of the pistol’s grip also instinctively position an operator’s hand for optimal shooting. Only HK handguns have such a customized grip.
The VP9’s proprietary captive flat recoil spring helps reduce the recoil forces effecting the operator and the handgun, improving shooter control during rapid firing and prolonging component service life.
HK’s famous cold hammer forged barrel is  made from cannon grade steel, and ensures long service life. Similar HK barrels on 9 mm P30 models have fired more than 90,000 rounds in endurance tests in 2010. The polygonal bore profile, with no traditional lands-and-grooves rifling, contributes to longer service life as well as a slight increase in muzzle velocity.
